import React from 'react' import './Style/BookElem.css' import AddIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Add'; import RemoveIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Remove'; import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/DeleteForever'; function BookElem(props) { const [state, setstate] = useState(initialState) return (

{props.title}

{props.author}

Price

{props.price}

Quantity

5

) } export default BookElem
